title: X-Metaverse
author: X-Metaverse
content: On November 8, 2022, X-Metaverse completed the fourth XMETA token burning under the Token burning program, destroying a total of 251,343 XMETA. the total current supply is 876,681,730.22 XMETA. the burning details are as follows.ðŸ”¥X-Metaverse in-game spendingXMETA burning amount: 21,695Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x78743732972fc619c9c34a8d8a6d17295aab61c9f206f460a187ed5623fcb327ðŸ”¥V2 market transaction fee (energy core, black box)XMETA burning amount: 13,382Transaction hashhttps://bscscan.com/tx/0x3f098d842505414c1bfaae771a31db2a2a3a1b1ce8eda3387c3bd90adece4859ðŸ”¥V2 market transaction fee (NFT BOX, Space Battleship, Pilot)XMETA burning amount: 28,871Transaction hashhttps://bscscan.com/tx/0xbd08929c083714ed07842717a9db259eb016f2b9baaf91c60747f632c62c5dbcðŸ”¥Space Battleship RetrofittingXMETA burning amount: 187,395Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0xd1b143fd20bbb93a926d51a6a6a325650ba1cb1be692571add61de87ef067fbdðŸ‘› XMETA total supplyBefore burning.Total supply: 900,000,000 XMETAFirst burn: 22,051,786 XMETASecond burn: 385,423.40 XMETAThird burn: 629,717.38 XMETAFourth burn: 251,343 XMETAAfter burning.Total supply: 876,681,730.22 XMETAAbout X-MetaverseX-Metaverse is a blockchain 3D game that runs on Android, IOS and PC. All game contents and characters are based on Blockchain tokens and NFTs. X-Metaverseâ€™s visuals and gameplay are inspired by Starcraft and Star Wars. Players will be immersed in the vast expanse of space, spending time cultivating different races, Upgrading ships, reaching more galaxies and collecting rare materials. The most exciting part is that you can earn cryptocurrency with other players through actions such as conquest, exploration, competition, mining, production, breeding and combat.Follow us on social media and be the first to get the news!Websiteï¼šhttps://www.x-metaverse.org/Twitterï¼šhttps://twitter.com/XMetaverse_Discordï¼šhttp://discord.gg/x-metaverseMediumï¼šhttps://medium.com/@X-MetaverseYouTubeï¼šhttps://www.youtube.com/c/XMetaverseTelegramï¼šX-Metaverse
